title: George Washington Memorial Parkway: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park       Stops along this ceremonial road form a sweeping course in American civics, from historic issues like colonization and slavery to pressing issues like climate change. These pages will help you understand the meaning of each.           History and Culture Explore the history and culture behind places along the parkway, such as the Marine Corps War Memorial and the Jones Point Lighthouse.           Nature Learn about the natural world that makes this park special, such as the unique Potomac Gorge ecosystem and the fragile processes that create Dyke Marsh.           Photos & Multimedia Browse photos and videos for a visual record of the park's history or a chance to hear a carillon concert.           Education The park offers many resources for teachers and their students, including lesson plans and field trips.
